3: That is the plan for the operation.
You must be reminded again that this operation is very important and comes with certain risks.
There is a large number of Corrupted in the battle area. Teams must work closely together to achieve the goal of liberating the area.
Please act with your assigned team and strictly follow the mission orders. In other cases, the commandant's decisions are the final commands.
Finally, I wish you all to return in triumph.
— Please accept the highest regards from the Command Center.
Shame that we're in different teams...
But aren't you on the same team as Lucia? I thought you wanted to have a practice match with her?
That's right... But Lucia doesn't like to talk. I'll look stupid if I'm the only one who enjoys the game and she doesn't even care a bit of it.
Hahaha, didn't think you would worry about stuff like this.
But she does look a little too distant indeed.
Whoa! Quietly or she'll hear us!
I didn't mean to say anything bad... I just feel that she is a little too determined, as if there is some kind of obsession supporting her to fight.
Is that so... Oh right, let's return to base together after finishing our mission!
Yeah.
Attention, the operation will begin in three minutes. Please proceed to the platform with the corresponding number to board the transport craft and prepare for battle.
We must get rid of those pests this time!
Well, let's part our ways here... And take care of yourself, Kamui. See you after the operation.
Construct Kamui.
I'll sacrifice everything to liberate the Earth.
